segments.text: Could you tell me what university you want to go to , John ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: University ? Why ? You asked me last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you ? And what course did you take there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: God save me ! Is there anything wrong with you ? Didn't I tell you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've not known . Perhaps , I've got a bad memory .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did a B . A . in economics . Remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Terrific ! B . A . , again and again-B . A .
segments.speaker: S1
